description:
Claritas is a new, globally relevant qualification from CFA Institute, designed for those working in key support functions within the investment industry. Typical candidates include those working in operations, IT, compliance, legal, HR and L&D. The exam is computer-based, and held daily all over the world.

This free course will tell you all about the program, and help you decide whether Claritas is for you.
title: Introduction to the Claritas Investment Certificate
